alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 8:22PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Elmore and northeastern Montgomery Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 822 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wetumpka to Pike Road. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Montgomery, Millbrook, Wetumpka, Pike Road, Elmore, Coosada, Montgomery Zoo, Boylston, Auburn University In Montgomery, Bob Woodruff Lake, Emerald Mountain, Snowdoun, Waugh, Lagoon Park, Alabama State University, Eastdale Mall, Mount Meigs, Montgomery Riverwalk Stadium, Blue Ridge and Pinedale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
